ld48-29.name: ld48-29
ld48-29.desc: unfinished game jam entry for the 29th LudumDare. Made with pixi.js in less than 15h. Graphics generated via code.

rule#34.name: rule#34
rule#34.desc: game created in 0 hours for the 0h game jam. My random topic was 'rule #34'. I was very tempted to re-roll. It has become one of my favorite own games.

pzero.name: pzero
pzero.desc: WIP racing game for Pebble, inspired in F-Zero. Made in C.

enitor.name: enitor
enitor.desc: a game I made during 2013's summer for playing with my cousins.

LudumPad.name: LudumPad
LudumPad.desc: an open-source library that lets you use mobile devices as game controllers with just a few lines of code.

Kipos.name: Kipos
Kipos.desc: an unfinished iOS game bout taking care of creatures with which you play minigames. Over 80,000 downloads on the App Store, and a rating average of 4,5/5 stars.

cellvorsum.name: cellvorsum
cellvorsum.desc: game jam entry for the 26th Ludum Dare.

subclass-error.name: subclass-error
subclass-error.desc: JS workaround for subclassing errors. Both instanceof and stack are functional.

mustache.js.name: mustache.js
mustache.js.desc: I'm a Maintainer/Collaborator for mustache.js, a library for minimal templating with {{mustaches}} in JavaScript.

mocha.name: mocha
mocha.desc: I'm a Maintainer/Collaborator for mocha, a simple, flexible, fun JavaScript test framework for node.js and the browser.

L8RYO.name: L8RYO
L8RYO.desc: Yo service that reminds you of random unread articles in your Pocket account.

KairosHacks.name: KairosHacks
KairosHacks.desc: organiser, speaker and judge at the first student hackathon in Spain. Over 200 students attended as hackers.

animus.name: Animus
animus.desc: The element of a person that enables them to be aware of the world and their experiences, to think, and to feel.
